trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示所有基底類別<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event to respond when the user clicks a ButtonBase.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件回應，當使用者按一下 ButtonBase。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: The user can raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event by using an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以引發<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>或控制項有焦點時按 ENTER 鍵或空白鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> to `true` and captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按下空格鍵，將控制項設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>至`true`和擷取滑鼠。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，控制項將會引發等<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter><xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged></xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>滑鼠事件

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> or capture the mouse, but it does raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>ENTER 不會變更或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>或捕捉滑鼠，但卻<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonBase sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A> attached property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: ButtonBase 集<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>附加屬性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonBase sets the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: ButtonBase 集<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A ButtonBase is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: ButtonBase 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，這表示它可以包含單一物件的任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或工作面板）。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref>按下。

trans-unit.source: The user can raise the Click event by using an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以藉由引發 Click 事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>或控制項有焦點時按 ENTER 鍵或空白鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> to `true` and captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按下空格鍵，將控制項設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>至`true`和擷取滑鼠。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，控制項將會引發等<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter><xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged></xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>滑鼠事件

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> or capture the mouse, but it does raise the Click event.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>ENTER 不會變更或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>或捕捉滑鼠，但它未引發 Click 事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase> marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> method and raises the Click event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>標記<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件，如處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>方法，並引發 Click 事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>

trans-unit.source: Hence, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> event will never occur for a control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>事件永遠不會繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>控制項</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，附加事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>事件或呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>與`handledEventsToo`設`true`。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |路由策略 |反昇 | |委派 ||

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This event corresponds to a left mouse button click.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會對應至按下滑鼠左的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: When the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當按此按鈕時叫用的命令。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to associate a command with a particular button instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來將命令與特定按鈕執行個體產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], this property is most often set to be a static command value from one of the existing command libraries, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands>.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，這個屬性通常設為其中一個現有的指令程式庫，例如<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands><xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands>或</xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands>靜態的命令值

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[指揮概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)或<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *commandName* The command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*commandName*按此按鈕時叫用的命令。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 按下此按鈕時叫用的命令。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要傳遞給參數<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Most existing commands from the command libraries do not use a command parameter.
trans-unit.target: 大部分現有的命令，從命令程式庫不會使用命令參數。

trans-unit.source: Of the commands that do use a command parameter, most of these take a parameter with some primitive type value, such as an integer or a string.
trans-unit.target: 使用命令參數的命令，大多數會接受參數，某些基本類型的值，例如整數或字串。

trans-unit.source: However, it is possible to create a custom command where that command expects a nonprimitive type as its command parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不過，便可建立自訂的命令在命令預期將非基本型別做為命令參數。

trans-unit.source: For a custom command case like this, setting CommandParameter in code might require a new or existing object instance.
trans-unit.target: 自訂命令這種情況下，程式碼中設定 CommandParameter 可能就需要將新的或現有的物件執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Setting CommandParameter in markup might require property element syntax, where the object element filling the property element syntax is a new element of the type expected by that command.
trans-unit.target: 在標記中設定 CommandParameter 可能需要屬性項目語法，其中的物件項目填滿屬性項目語法是該命令所預期的類型的新項目。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, setting in markup might require a reference through a markup extension to an existing object (typically these references are made with [Binding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: 或者，在標記中的設定可能需要透過標記延伸的現有物件的參考 (這些參考通常使用所提出[繫結標記延伸](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)或[StaticResource 標記延伸](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md))。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *commandParameter* A value of the same type as the particular command specified in the property expects.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*commandParameter*相同的型別中指定的特定命令的值屬性預期。

trans-unit.source: If you use an existing command library command, see that command library's documentation for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage information, including which type of CommandParameter the command expects.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用現有的指令程式庫指令時，請參閱該命令程式庫的文件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用量資訊，包括哪一種 CommandParameter 命令預期。

trans-unit.source: If you use a custom command, see Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用自訂的命令，請參閱 < 備註 >。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Parameter to pass to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞給參數<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the routed <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別路由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element on which to raise the specified command.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定引發指定的命令的項目。

trans-unit.source: The CommandTarget property cannot be used to define a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: CommandTarget 屬性不能用來定義<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The CommandTarget property provides a reference to an element that is already defined somewhere in your application.
trans-unit.target: CommandTarget 屬性提供的參考已經已定義在應用程式中的項目。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *elementName* The name of that receives the command.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*elementName*名稱接收命令。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Element on which to raise a command.
trans-unit.target: 要引發的命令項目。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得值<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: If you choose to override this implementation, make certain that you call the base method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選擇覆寫這個實作，請確定呼叫基底方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項已啟用。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> is currently activated.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref>目前已啟動。

trans-unit.source: IsPressed is the state of a button that indicates the left mouse button or SPACEBAR is pressed over the button.
trans-unit.target: IsPressed 是按鈕，指出滑鼠左鍵的狀態，或移至按鈕按下空格鍵。

trans-unit.source: When IsPressed is `true`, the control captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: IsPressed 時`true`，控制項捕捉到滑鼠。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，控制項將會引發等<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter><xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged></xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>滑鼠事件

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change IsPressed or capture the mouse, but is does raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>或 ENTER 不會變更 IsPressed 或捕捉滑鼠，但沒有引發<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsPressed has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 3.0 版 Service Pack 1，IsPressed 有受保護的 setter。

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設.NET Framework 3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> is activated; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref>啟動; 否則為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Responds when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*> for this control is called.
trans-unit.target: 回應時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>為此控制項稱為。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A> is `true`, this method calls the base implementation, which gives this control focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A>是`true`，這個方法會呼叫基底實作，它將提供此控制項焦點。</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 控制項引發<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[路由傳送事件概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>

trans-unit.source: The data for <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 針對資料<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref>這個控制項沒有焦點時使用者按下按鍵時所發生的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> and one of the following cases are true: - The user presses the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>未設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>和下列情況的其中一個條件成立:-使用者按下空格鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: - The user presses ENTER and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A> is `true` for this control.
trans-unit.target: -使用者按下 ENTER 鍵和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>是`true`對這個控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, this implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event data.
trans-unit.target: 在其他情況下，此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性) 的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>事件資料。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user releases a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref>發生於使用者鬆開按鍵，而此控制項有焦點的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when the user releases the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`當使用者放開空格鍵。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event data.
trans-unit.target: 否則，此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性) 的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>事件資料。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Called when an element loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 當項目失去鍵盤焦點時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref> routed event that occurs when this control is no longer receiving mouse event messages.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref>這個控制項不再收到滑鼠事件訊息時所發生的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> event data.
trans-unit.target: 此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性) 的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture>事件資料。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*> routed event that occurs when the mouse enters this control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>發生於滑鼠進入這個控制項的路由的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>, this implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>設為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>，此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>為藉由設定已處理的事件<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性之事件資料`true`並引發<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> routed event that occurs when the mouse leaves an element.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref>發生於滑鼠離開元素的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>為藉由設定已處理的事件<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref>發生於滑鼠指標位於這個控制項上時按下滑鼠左鍵的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>未設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要回應<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件，附加事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>事件或呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>與`handledEventsToo`設`true`。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>，這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref>發生於滑鼠指標位於此控制項上方且放開滑鼠左的按鈕的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>未設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要回應<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>事件，附加事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp>事件或呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>與`handledEventsToo`設`true`。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> is `true`, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>是`true`，這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> routed event that occurs when the mouse pointer moves while over this element.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref>發生於滑鼠指標移動此元素上方的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>未設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要回應<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>事件，附加事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove>事件或呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>與`handledEventsToo`設`true`。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the rendered size of a control changes.
trans-unit.target: 呈現的控制項的大小變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the OnRenderSizeChanged method of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> OnRenderSizeChanged 的方法

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size changes.
trans-unit.target: 指定的大小變更。
